unnormalised: **Question: What are some yoga practices that can improve my overall well-being?**
normalised: **Question: What are some yoga practices that can improve my overall well-being?**

unnormalised: Okay, so you're looking to boost your wellness through yoga? That's awesome! Yoga isn't just about pretzel-like poses; it's a holistic practice rooted in ancient Indian traditions.
normalised: Okay, so you are looking to boost your wellness through yoga? That is awesome! Yoga is not just about pretzel-like poses; it is a holistic practice rooted in ancient Indian traditions.

unnormalised: First off, **Surya Namaskar** (Sun Salutations) is a classic. It's a sequence that warms up your body, improves flexibility, and energizes you for the day. Do a few rounds, maybe starting with 5 and increasing as you get comfortable.
normalised: First off, **Surya Namaskar** (Sun Salutations) is a classic. It is a sequence that warms up your body, improves flexibility, and energizes you for the day. Do a few rounds, maybe starting with five and increasing as you get comfortable.

unnormalised: For stress relief, try **Pranayama**. Anulom Vilom (alternate nostril breathing) is fantastic for calming the mind. Kapalabhati is great for energizing, but avoid it if you have high blood pressure. Practice in a well-ventilated room, maybe on a yoga mat in your 100 sq ft balcony.
normalised: For stress relief, try **Pranayama**. Anulom Vilom (alternate nostril breathing) is fantastic for calming the mind. Kapalabhati is great for energizing, but avoid it if you have high blood pressure. Practice in a well-ventilated room, maybe on a yoga mat in your one hundred square feet balcony.

unnormalised: **Asanas** are physical postures. Tadasana (Mountain Pose) improves posture, and Adho Mukha Svanasana (Downward-Facing Dog) strengthens the entire body. If you're a beginner, look for beginner-friendly classes at a studio near you - perhaps something offered at a Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Center.
normalised: **Asanas** are physical postures. Tadasana (Mountain Pose) improves posture, and Adho Mukha Svanasana (Downward-Facing Dog) strengthens the entire body. If you are a beginner, look for beginner-friendly classes at a studio near you - perhaps something offered at a Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Center.

unnormalised: Don't forget **Meditation**! Even 5-10 minutes of daily meditation can drastically reduce anxiety. Just sit comfortably and focus on your breath, like Dr. Sharma recommended to my aunt, Reena aunty.
normalised: Don't forget **Meditation**! Even five to ten minutes of daily meditation can drastically reduce anxiety. Just sit comfortably and focus on your breath, like Doctor Sharma recommended to my aunt, Reena aunty.

unnormalised: Remember to listen to your body and consult a qualified yoga instructor, maybe someone from the Krishnamacharya Yoga Mandiram if possible, before starting any new practice. And it's not about Rs. 5000 worth of fancy gear, but consistency. Good luck on your yoga journey!
normalised: Remember to listen to your body and consult a qualified yoga instructor, maybe someone from the Krishnamacharya Yoga Mandiram if possible, before starting any new practice. And it is not about rupee five thousand worth of fancy gear, but consistency. Good luck on your yoga journey!
